content.raw: Personally, I would say that this should not be defined in the GUI at all \(but would be displayed\), or perhaps add a checbox or pulldown that switches between three modes: \(1\) Use labscript only; \(2\) use labscript if provided, otherwise front panel; \(3\) over-ride with front panel always.  \(2\) would be the default.
content.html: Personally, I would say that this should not be defined in the GUI at all (but would be displayed), or perhaps add a checbox or pulldown that switches between three modes: (1) Use labscript only; (2) use labscript if provided, otherwise front panel; (3) over-ride with front panel always. (2) would be the default.
